alert.note: Alert for Lower Slopes of the Eastern Washington Cascades Crest; Simcoe Highlands; Yakima Valley (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 19 at 7:01PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Yakima County through 745 PM PDT... At 701 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over western Yakama Reservation, or 28 miles north of Goldendale, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... White Swan and Yakama Reservation. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Lower Slopes of the Eastern Washington Cascades Crest; Simcoe Highlands; Yakima Valley
